lead_paragraph: A manual for a program monitoring sites like Facebook and Twitter has come under scrutiny over how far and broadly officials should look without violating privacy or free speech rights.

headline.seo: Homeland Analysts Told to Monitor Policy Debates in Social Media
headline.main: Homeland Analysts Told to Monitor Policy Debates in Social Media
headline.print_headline: Hearing Held on Program Monitoring Social Media

abstract: Manual for a Homeland Security Department program monitoring sites like Facebook and Twitter has come under scrutiny over how far and broadly officials should look without violating privacy or free speech rights.
snippet: A manual for a program monitoring sites like Facebook and Twitter has come under scrutiny over how far and broadly officials should look without violating privacy or free speech rights.
